info.title: Promptchan API
info.description:
# Welcome to the Promptchan API
Discover the freedom to create with the Promptchan API, designed for developers and creators seeking the state of the art Image generation platform. Our API provides powerful capabilities for generating and editing images allowing for broader creative expression based on provided parameters. Ideal for projects requiring a high degree of flexibility and fidelity in Image Creation, Promptchan API is your go-to solution for pushing the power of AI image generation.

## Server Endpoints

- **Image Requests:** Use `https://prod.aicloudnetservices.com/` for all image generation requests.


## Getting Started

To access and utilize the Promptchan API effectively, please follow these steps:

### 1. Sign in or Sign Up

- Users should sign in or sign up for an account by visiting `https://promptchan.com/signup`.
- An account is required to access the API and generate your unique API key.

### 

### 2. Generate Your API Key

- After signing in and upgrading your account, navigate to the settings menu at `https://promptchan.com/settings` and find the API Key section to "Generate".
- Your API key serves as your authentication for API requests. Keep it secure and do not share it publicly.

### 3. Top Up Your Account with Gems

- The API utilizes Gems as currency for image generation. One Gem equals one image generation.
- Purchase Gems at `https://promptchan.com/gems`. Packages vary, allowing you to choose the best fit for your needs.
- Gems will be credited to your account upon purchase, enabling you to start generating images through the API.

### 4. Making API Requests

- **Base URL:** The base URL for all API endpoints is `https://prod.aicloudnetservices.com/`.
- **Authentication:** Include your API key in the request header as `x-api-key` to authenticate your API requests.

With your Pro subscription, API key, and Gems, you are fully equipped to explore the capabilities of the Promptchan API. Detailed information on specific endpoints and their usage is available in the sections below.

 <sub>*High usage may result in extra charges during peak times, up to 0.25 Gems.*</sub>

post.summary: Generates an image based on provided parameters. There's a base cost of 1 Gem for an image.

style.description: Art style of the image. Defaults to 'Cinematic'.

poses.description: Pose for the generated image, categorized by model type.

filter.description: Filter applied to the image. Defaults to 'Default'.

detail.description: Detail level of the image stylization, recommended between -2 and 2.

prompt.description: Text prompt for guiding the image generation.

seed.description: Seed for deterministic results. Use -1 for random.

quality.description: Quality setting of the generated image. Defaults to 'Ultra'. 'Extreme' quality costs 1 extra Gem, and 'Max' quality costs 2 extra Gems.

creativity.description: Creativity level of the generation, recommended values are 30, 50, 70.

negative_prompt.description: Text prompt specifying what to avoid in the generation.

restore_faces.description: Whether to apply face restoration. Costs 1 extra Gem and should only be used for realistic styles.

age_slider.description: Slider to control the perceived age of the subject. Minimum value is 18.

weight_slider.description: Slider to control the body weight of the subject, recommended between -1 and 1.

breast_slider.description: Slider to adjust the size or prominence of the subject's breasts, recommended between -1 and 1.

ass_slider.description: Slider to adjust the size or prominence of the subject's ass, recommended between -1 and 1.

error.description: Error message indicating the API key was invalid.

post.summary: Handles chat interactions with AI companion.

message.description: User's message to the AI companion.

characterData.description: Character profile information used to personalize responses.

personality.description: A brief description of the character's personality traits.

scenario.description: Context or setting in which the character exists.

openness.description: How open the character is between 0 - 2.

chatHistory.description: Previous messages exchanged between the user and the AI.

role.description: The speaker of the message ('user' or 'assistant').

isRoleplay.description: Indicates if the conversation is in roleplay mode.

redo.description: If true, requests a redo of the last AI response instead.

200.description: Successful response containing the chat message and updated chat history.

audioEnabled.description: Flag to enable or disable audio in the video.

prompt.description: Prompt text for generating video content.

seed.description: Random seed value for video generation.

200.description: Video submission accepted, returns a unique request identifier.

request_id.description: Unique identifier for the video request.

get.summary: Checks the status of a video generation request.

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the video request.

200.description: Returns the current status of the video generation process.

details.description: Optional additional details regarding the status.

get.summary: Retrieves the progress logs of a video generation request.

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the video request.

200.description: Returns progress of the video generation process.

get.summary: Retrieves the result of a completed video generation request.

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the video request.

200.description: Returns the generated video and associated metadata.

message.description: Additional message regarding the video processing result.

video.description: URL to the generated video file.

gems.description: Number of gems used or awarded.

ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key needed to authorize requests.
